level.text: The Department may revoke, suspend, or deny a certificate issued pursuant to this chapter according to the procedures established in and for the reasons given in 29 DCMR ยง2367. The Department may also suspend, revoke, or deny a certificate issued pursuant to this chapter for the following additional reasons:
Performing a type of rehabilitation service for which the substance abuse treatment program has not been certified;
Billing or accepting payment for services not provided;
Misrepresenting the qualifications of the person providing the service;
Billing for a different quantity or quality of medications than actually provided; or
Providing a type of treatment for which the client has not given informed consent.
